description: Do you need some help navigating Adobe's Creative Cloud? This VTC QuickStart! course will quickly get you up and running in Photoshop CC. Expert photographer Phil Hawkins covers new and improved features like Camera Shake Reduction and the Adobe Exchange Panel. Then he gives you an entire chapter on Camera Raw 8 before moving on to hands-on demonstrations of the tools in both landscape and portrait photography. This title is a self-paced software training course delivered via pre-recorded video. We do not provide additional information outside of the posted content.
title: QuickStart! - Adobe Photoshop CC
